description: Celery (Apium graveolens var. dulce) is an amazing plant that can be included in both savory and sweet dishes. It's low calorie, high in dietary fiber and contains vitamins A, C, and K, as well as essential minerals like potassium. Also, celery boosts the immune system and helps to reduce inflammation. Plus, it has high water content and its neutral flavor profile makes it perfect for adding to almost any dish, from salads to soups to breads. Celery is an amazing superfood that can help you stay healthy and fit!
